mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow_list WHERE user_id=#{userId}) AS userFollowingCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM follow_list WHERE follow_user_id=#{userId}) AS userFollowersCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_review WHERE user_id=#{userId}) AS userReviewsCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_collection WHERE user_id=#{userId}) AS userCollectionsCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_shelf WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND shelf_type=3) AS totalBooksReadCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM book_shelf WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND shelf_type=3 AND YEAR(creation_date) = YEAR(CURDATE())) AS annualBooksReadCount FROM user WHERE id=#{userId}
